responses.0:
Salve Michele,
Sarei felice di ospitarti ma il prezzo e' quello che e' listato
Saluti
Stefania *************** Hi Stefania, my name is Michele and I am interested in staying at your place for 2 days, from 2016-04-23 to 2016-04-25. The calendar is open on these days and I am wondering if it is still available? A little bit more about myself: I am a graduate student from Milan, Italy and study Communication Design. I am fond of exploring cultures and visual arts around the world. Because my schedule match perfectly with the opening in your calendar, I am wondering if you would be willing to lower the rate to $45/night? I would be willing to make the booking immediately if the price is ok with you. ***************

Hello Michele-
Thank you for your inquiry.  I have sent you a special offer which reduces the price by $50, however I can not lower it to $75 per night.  It is still very reasonably priced for four people considering the convenience of the neighborhood and how comfortable and  well kept the apartment is.  Let me know what you decide.  
Best,

Hello Michele, 

The apartment is available and I'd be happy to host you, however the rate is firm. There is a discount for longer stays but for a short turnaround I cannot lower the rate. Feel free to ask any additional questions you may have, you are pre-approved to finalize your reservation at the current rate. 

Regards,

responses.9:
Hi Michele,
It's a pleasure to meet you!

My name is Richard and I'm with Guesty, we help Eric with Airbnb.

Thank you for the inquiry!
Your dates (May. 31 - Jun. 02) are available and we would be delighted to host you during your stay.

Please allow me to check regarding a discount withEric, and I will get back to you as soon as I have an answer!

Thank you for your patience, and should you require any other information please do not hesitate to contact me.

Best,

responses.14:
Hello Michele,

These dates are currently free and I'd be happy to host you. Unfortunately our normal rates are $230 a night, so these dates are already heavily discounted. However I will send you a special offer with a bit more of a discount if that helps. Our place has 3 separate queen bedrooms in a luxury apartment setting; to be frank, I'm not sure you can find that within NYC for $110 per night near a subway (one-bedroom would be around that price). 

Thanks,

responses.15:
Hi Michele!
Thank you for the inquiry.
The dates are indeed available, and you're welcome to stay with us.
I've adjusted the price to 170/night + cleaning fee, so you're welcome to finalize the booking.
Also, if you would like we will gladly give you some tips about discovering New York and everything it has to offer in terms of exploring different cultures of our city - we always keep updated list of the places and experiences worth seeing, and we're happy to share that with our guests.
Looking forward to welcome you in New York in May.

Best,
